item.description:
M2D2 Open House August 16, 2011
5:30 - 8:00 p.m. Wannalancit Mills, 600 Suffolk Street, Second Floor Lowell, MA 01854 The Massachusetts Medical Device Development Center (M2D2) has recently opened their new medical device business incubator/accelerator. The new facility is open for business and features state of the art wet labs, private offices, and flexible cubicle space. Start-up companies and entrepreneurs can license the space they need from M2D2 and focus on growing their medical device from idea to fruition. Come to our open house eventand learn to launch your medical device company. Our experienced directors and executive team will be at te event and will sit down with you to discuss your idea! "Let M2D2 help your new medical device venture be a success!"
item.name: M2D2 Open House
